images.caption: Figure 1:Overall framework of SciPrompt. The left side shows the overall process of masked language modeling for performing the text classification task. The right side shows our proposed knowledge retrieval and domain-adaptive filtering phase (ยง3). The prediction results, such as CR and SE, correspond to the class labels for Cryptography and Software Engineering, respectively, and are used for scientific knowledge retrieval.

Figure 2:Performance comparison of few-shot methods over three datasets in Table1. We report the mean accuracy of each setting. Our method shows high stability in the accuracy distribution compared to the considered baseline models.
Figure 3:Model comparison through the Emerging NLP dataset under five-shot and zero-shot settings (ยง5.2).
